movie.title: King in the Wilderness
movie.plot: A look at the final years in the life of Martin Luther King, Jr.

movie.title: Truth At Last: The Assassination of Martin Luther King
movie.plot: On April 4, 1967, Dr. Martin Luther King delivered a passionate speech at Riverside Church in New York staking out his opposition to the war in Vietnam. One year later to the day, he was ...
